title: Ep. - 513 - AUDRINA PATRIDGE FROM THE HILLS
description:
Kate discusses Claim to Fame (ABC), The Bachelorette (ABC), and The Captain (ESPN+). 

 

Audrina Patridge is one of the original stars of the MTV series The Hills, a reality show and pop culture phenomenon that lasted from 2006 to 2010. In 2019, Audrina and the show returned to MTV with the highly anticipated reboot The Hills: New Beginnings. She discusses being cast for the show, how it changed her career, becoming a mother, and regaining her voice after years in a series of unfulfilling and even toxic relationships. Her new book is Choices: To The Hills and Back Again.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Cameo: https://cameo.com/katecasey

Clubhouse: @katecasey

Amazon.com: www.amazon.com/shop/katecasey
